comment.raw:
/**
 * An optional title to display above the code block.
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * 'code'
 */
comment.summary: An optional title to display above the code block.

comment.raw:
/**
 * The language to use. Must be a {@link ValidLanguage}.
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * 'json'
 */
comment.summary: The language to use.  Must be a {@link ValidLanguage}.

comment.raw:
/**
 * Effectively just disables the client-side highlighting, assuming the text has already been highlighted on the server.
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * false
 */
comment.summary:
Effectively just disables the client-side highlighting,
assuming the text has already been highlighted on the server.

comment.raw:
/**
 * If true, a button will be displayed to copy the code to the clipboard.
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * true
 */
comment.summary: If true, a button will be displayed to copy the code to the clipboard.
